original_text: But be careful! Do not turn away from the Lord so that you worship other gods. Do not let those things deceive you.
korean_text: 너희는 스스로 삼가라 두렵건대 마음에 미혹하여 돌이켜 다른 신들을 섬기며 그것에게 절하므로

sentences.original_text: Do not turn away from the Lord
so that you worship other gods.
Do not let those things deceive you.
